ygData.subject: Updated: Rangers and Warriors
ygData.msgSnippet: I achieved level 10 with my Ranger last night and found something quite disturbing. I gained a +4 damage bonus.  Very odd as I never got one up to level 15
ygData.messageBody:
I achieved level 10 with my Ranger last night and found something quite disturbing.
I gained a +4 damage bonus. Very odd as I never got one up to level 15 with my warrior, who by all accounts should be the recipient of any damage bonuses.

This might have something to do with the patch this week so I am going to log in as my warrior tonight and experiment.

This is the fact. My Fine steel 2 handed sword has a damage of 12 and delay of 43. I normally hit for 21 damage with it. 2 days ago I bought a purity belt boosting my str from 80 to 82. I did not notice any damage change. Last night within minutes of levelling up to 10 I started hitting for max damage of 25.

Any one know anything about this?
